diagrams.title: Register Account
diagrams.description: I want to register a new account, using an email and password.

diagrams.title: Change Password

threats.title: DDOS
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: XSS OWASP-ID-003
threats.description: Injecting malicious scripts that could manipulate the password change process or steal new passwords.
threats.mitigation: Implement input validation, output encoding, and Content Security Policy (CSP).

threats.title: Insecure Password Storage OWASP-ID-009
threats.description: New passwords stored in plaintext or weakly hashed form, making them susceptible to theft.
threats.mitigation: Use strong cryptographic hashing and salt passwords before storing them.

threats.title: Insufficient Transport Layer Protection OWASP-ID-008
threats.description: Lack of HTTPS or weak encryption could expose the new password during transmission.
threats.mitigation: Implement HTTPS with strong encryption, use HSTS (HTTP Strict Transport Security), and avoid mixed content.

threats.title: Insecure Password Recovery OWASP-ID-010
threats.description: Weak or easily guessable password recovery mechanisms that allow unauthorized password changes.
threats.mitigation: Implement secure password change processes with multi-factor authentication and security questions.

threats.title: Insufficient Logging and Monitoring OWASP-ATC-004
threats.description: Inability to detect and alert on suspicious password change attempts or patterns
threats.mitigation: Implement comprehensive logging, monitoring, and alerting mechanisms for password change events.

diagrams.description: As a Client, I want to change the password of my account

diagrams.title: Sign In

threats.title: Nova ameaça STRIDE
threats.description: Provide a description for this threat
threats.mitigation: Provide remediation for this threat or a reason if status is N/A

threats.title: XSS OWASP-ID-003
threats.description: Injecting malicious scripts into the sign-in page that could steal user credentials or perform actions on behalf of the user.
threats.mitigation: Implement input validation, output encoding, and Content Security Policy (CSP)

threats.title: Brute Force Attack
threats.description: Threat actors might attempt to guess or brute force credentials to gain unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: Use CAPTCHA or multi-factor authentication (MFA) to prevent automated brute force attacks.

threats.title: Credential Stuffing
threats.description: Attackers use previously leaked credentials from other services to gain unauthorized access.
threats.mitigation: Monitor for unusual login patterns and implement MFA.

threats.title: Man-in-the-Middle (MitM) Attack
threats.description: An attacker intercepts communication between the client and server to capture login credentials.

threats.title: Insecure Password Storage  OWASP-ID-009
threats.description: Passwords stored in plaintext or weakly hashed form, making them susceptible to theft.
threats.mitigation:
Hash passwords using strong cryptographic algorithms (e.g., bcrypt, Argon2).
Use salts and implement password stretching.

threats.title: Inadequate Account Lockout OWASP-ATC-003
threats.description: Lack of or ineffective account lockout mechanism could allow brute force attacks to continue without detection
threats.mitigation: Implement account lockout after a specified number of failed attempts and provide recovery options for legitimate users.

threats.title: Insider Threats OWASP-ATC-005
threats.description: Malicious insiders with access to the system might misuse their privileges to compromise user accounts.
threats.mitigation: Implement least privilege access controls, monitor insider activities, and conduct regular security awareness training.

threats.title: Account Enumeration OWASP-ID-011
threats.mitigation: Implement generic error messages, use rate limiting on login attempts, and avoid revealing user-specific information.

diagrams.description: As a Client, I want to sign in
